mapper.insert: insert into report(re_content, re_date, re_rc_num, re_me_id, re_report_id, re_report_product) values(#{r.re_content}, now(), #{r.re_rc_num}, #{r.re_me_id}, #{r.re_report_id}, #{r.re_report_product})
insert into message(me_title, me_content, me_time, me_send_id, me_receive_id) values(#{m.me_title},#{m.me_content}, now(), #{m.me_send_id}, #{m.me_receive_id})
insert into auction_record(ar_bid_time, ar_bid_price, ar_me_id, ar_au_num) values(now(), #{p}, #{i}, #{n})
mapper.select: select * from seller_like where sl_me_id = #{userId} and sl_seller_id = #{sellerId}
mapper.insert: insert into seller_like(sl_me_id, sl_seller_id, sl_state) values(#{userId}, #{sellerId}, #{num})
